评论详情: This too does everything you need it to do and more. I took a gamble and sized down since it was preloved and assumed it would be “stretched” which it definitely was. But it worked out because it fits me perfectly! The knit on this too works to really cinch you in. Any girl would look gorgeous in this.
You can tell that this sweater was once beautiful but also very used. The sweater is covered in piling and stretched out in some places.
It’s a cute sweater and well made but if you’re short and curvy it will look terrible. On the other hand for price, if you’re short with a straight frame you can probably achieve “meh.”
